name: World Conference on Computer and Information Technology
content: The World Conference on Computer and Information Technology is a forum organized by STECONF. This Computer conference 2022 will take place from July 15 to 17, 2022 in Amsterdam, Netherlands. The conference is intended to bring together researchers, scientists, and engineers to discuss experimental and theoretical results, mainly in the area of software engineering. The conference also covers topics related to computer science and information technology.
